participant_1.name: Amira
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and expressive, with a passion for culture and learning.
participant_1.background: I'm proud of my sister for being a great guitarist. I don't talk to my dad because he's a deadbeat, but I love the color pink! I hate to workout, but I need to. I like to go to museums on the weekend to learn new things and experience different cultures. My family is from Algeria.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: creative and adventurous, with a love for art and nature.
participant_2.background: I love Halloween and am hoping to have a spooky proposal with a lot of sci-fi and horror elements. I love to express myself through poetry and makeup. I saw a blue whale when I went to the aquarium. I like to play video games and go for walks with my dog Percy. I like to design jewelry to relax.

content.text: Hey, I'm doing good! How are you?
I'm doing good, thanks for asking!
That's good to hear! I love Halloween! Do you have any fun Halloween plans?
I'm actually not sure yet! I might go to a party or something.
That sounds like fun! I'm going to be having a spooky proposal with my boyfriend.
Oh wow, that sounds really cool! Are you excited?
Yes, I'm really excited! I love Halloween and I'm hoping to have a lot of sci-fi and horror elements in the proposal.
That sounds like it will be so much fun! I'm sure it will be great.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to express myself through poetry and makeup. I also like to play video games and go for walks with my dog Percy.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to go to museums on the weekend to learn new things and experience different cultures.
Oh, that sounds really cool! I love learning new things too. I've always wanted to visit Algeria, what's it like there?
It's beautiful! I'm from there and I love the food, the culture, and the people.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Algeria
